article_title: Hillary Clinton should have stopped the sale of Michigan high-tech battery plants to China.
article_text:
As Secretary of State, Hillary Clinton failed to stop the sale of Michigan high-tech battery plants to China.

Buy Photo Hillary Clinton should have stopped the sale of Michigan high-tech battery plants to China. (Photo: Mike Thompson/DFP)Buy Photo
